title: Whitehurst Zim's Clifford The Elf Holding Sleigh Bells Christmas Figurine
features: Zim's elves are a charming line of whimsical elves made of resin
Clifford stands 10.5 Inches tall and encourages the magic of the holiday seasons
Collectible Box updated with The Elves Themselves Image, not individual images.
This is a holiday collectible for your home decorations. This is NOT a toy.
description: From The Elves Themselves Collection, by Zims . Exclusive collectible elves were introduced in January 2000 and have become an overnight sensation. With these incredibly successful lines of finished products, many people have now become familiar with the Zim's name and our consistent dedication to quality, creativity and service. Zim's now has three generations of Zimmerman family members working to insure customers are always pleased. Each figure is a handmade work of art, loaded with quality detail, delightful charm and sterling character. Clifford stands ready to string a garland of bells around the workshop. Comes nicely boxed. Dimensions: 10.5 Inches H. Material(s): resin and fabric. This is a holiday collectible for your home decorations. This is NOT a toy.
